spells.name: Dark Flight
spells.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and knocking up targets at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
spells.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.tooltip:
While toggled off Aatrox benefits from Blood Thirst, while toggled on Blood Price is activated and removes Blood Thirst.

Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health.

Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.

spells.name: Blades of Torment
spells.description: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to all enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Massacre
spells.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions around him, increasing his Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}%, and gaining 175 Attack Range for 12 seconds.

spells.name: Death Sentence
spells.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.tooltip:
Grab an enemy, then pull them to you or leap to them.
Throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy.

Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.tooltip:
Create a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to you.
Throw the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up and Thresh pulls both back to him.

Additionally, allies who come near it gain a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Allies can only receive the shield once per cast.

spells.name: Flay
spells.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Deal {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} magic damage on each hit that builds up when not attacking.
This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.

Active: Knock nearby enemies in the direction of your choice.
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

spells.name: The Box
spells.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.tooltip:
Trap enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
Creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal half damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

spells.name: Mocking Shout
spells.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Spinning Slash
spells.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This effect is doubled against champions.

spells.name: Undying Rage
spells.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spells.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

spells.name: Barrel Roll
spells.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 5 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Attack Speed lowered.
spells.tooltip: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Drunken Rage
spells.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second, restoring his mana. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, increasing his damage dealt and reducing damage received.
spells.tooltip: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask, channeling for 1 second.  He gains {{ e3 }} mana while channeling, and becomes empowered after finishing, increasing physical attack damage by {{ e2 }}, and reducing damage taken by {{ e1 }}% for 20 seconds.

spells.name: Body Slam
spells.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and slowing their movement.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by 35% for 2.5 seconds.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by 50% if Gragas collides with a unit.

spells.name: Explosive Cask
spells.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, which explodes on impact, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.tooltip: Gragas throws his cask to an area. Upon landing, it deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all units struck, knocking them back.

spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with a delayed high damage poison, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits a champion.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia blasts an area with a delayed high damaging poison, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds and granting her {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds if she hits a champion.

spells.name: Miasma
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia releases a growing cloud of poison that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Any enemy that passes through it is poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%. Continual exposure renews this poison.

spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.description: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target. If the target is poisoned the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to her target. If the target is poisoned then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Devastating Blow
spells.description: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing attack damage plus a flat amount and 8% of her target's max health as bonus damage. The bonus damage cannot exceed a threshold based on rank.
spells.tooltip: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) plus 8% of her target's maximum health as magic damage. The base plus percent health bonus damage cannot exceed {{ e3 }}.

spells.name: Paragon of Demacia
spells.description: Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's armor and damage are increased for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times. Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her movement speed is increased for 5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's armor and damage are increased by {{ e1 }} for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times.

Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her movement speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Heroic Charge
spells.description: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them further. The initial impact deals a small amount of damage, and if they collide with terrain, her target will take a high amount of damage and be stunned.
spells.tooltip: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them for a short distance. The initial impact deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If they collide with terrain, her target takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and will be stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Diplomatic Immunity
spells.description: Poppy focuses intently on a single enemy champion, dealing increased damage to them. Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target.
spells.tooltip:
For {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target enemy champion.
Poppy deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the marked target.

spells.name: Overload
spells.description: Ryze throws a charge of pure energy at an enemy for heavy damage and additional damage based upon Ryze's maximum mana. Ryze also gains passive cooldown reduction.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of Ryze's maximum Mana (+{{ f1 }}) in magic damage.

Passive: Gains {{ e2 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

spells.name: Rune Prison
spells.description: Ryze traps target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving. Also gains bonus damage based on Ryze's maximum mana.
spells.tooltip: Roots the enemy for {{ e1 }} second(s), dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of Ryze's maximum Mana (+{{ f1 }}) in magic damage.

spells.name: Spell Flux
spells.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that deals damage and bounces from the initial target up to 5 times. Also gains bonus damage based on Ryze's maximum mana. Targets hit have their magic resistance reduced.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes an orb that bounces to enemies or Ryze up to 5 times.

Each bounce deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of Ryze's maximum Mana (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reduces Magic Resist by {{ e2 }} for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Desperate Power
spells.description: Ryze channels immense arcane power, he gains spell vamp and all of his spells deal area of effect damage.
spells.tooltip: Channels immense arcane power gaining {{ e2 }}% Spell Vamp, and {{ e4 }} Movement Speed. Spells deal 50% area of effect damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cryptic Gaze
spells.description: Sion's stare terrifies a single enemy, dealing damage and stunning them.
spells.tooltip: Blasts a single enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Death's Caress
spells.description: Sion surrounds himself with a damage-absorbing shield.  If the shield is not destroyed in 10 seconds then it will explode, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Cast again after 4 seconds to manually detonate.
spells.tooltip:
Sion surrounds himself with a shield which absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. If the shield is not destroyed in 10 seconds, it will explode, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies.

Cast again after 4 seconds to manually detonate.

spells.name: Enrage
spells.description: While active Sion gains Attack Damage at the cost of Health on each basic attack. Additonally, he permanently increases his maximum Health whenever he kills a unit.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Sion's Attack Damage is increased by {{ e1 }} and he permanently gains {{ e2 }} maximum Health per kill. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters

Total Health gained: +{{ f1 }}

spells.name: Cannibalism
spells.description: Sion consumes some of his enemies' life force on each attack, leeching health to himself and nearby allies. The smell of flesh also renews Sion's fervor, increasing his Attack Speed.
spells.tooltip: Grants Sion {{ e1 }}% Life Steal and {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed for 20 seconds. Additionally, Sion's basic attacks heal surrounding allies for {{ e2 }}% of the damage dealt.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description: Annie hurls a mana-infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the mana cost if it destroys the target.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost is refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

spells.name: Incinerate
spells.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
spells.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

spells.name: Molten Shield
spells.description: Increases Annie's Armor and Magic Resist and damages enemies who hit Annie with basic attacks.
spells.tooltip: Increases Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds. Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies who attack Annie with basic attacks.

spells.name: Summon: Tibbers
spells.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
spells.tooltip:
Tibbers appears in a burst of flame dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area.

For the next {{ e6 }} seconds, Tibbers chases down enemies and deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby foes.

Tibbers can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Inner Flame
spells.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame at the impact area or upon reaching maximum range, slowing enemies for 50%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

spells.name: Focused Resolve
spells.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage over time and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, dealing bonus damage and healing.
spells.tooltip:
Links Karma to target enemy champion, revealing them, and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds, rooting them in place for {{ e2 }} seconds if the link is not broken.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Focused Resolve deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over the duration and heals Karma instantly for 20% (+{{ a2 }}%) of her Missing Health. If the leash is not broken, she is healed for another 20% (+{{ a2 }}%).

spells.name: Inspire
spells.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the movement speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to casting the shield, energy radiates out from the shield, dealing damage to enemies and applying Inspire to allied champions.
spells.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to enemy units around her target. Allied champions around her target gain half that amount as a shield, and are also hasted by {{ e5 }}%.

spells.name: Mantra
spells.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
spells.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, heavily slowing enemies and dealing damage after a brief delay.

Renewal: The link deals bonus magic damage to her target, instantly healing Karma for 20% of her Missing Health. If the link is not broken, Karma is healed again for the same amount.

Defiance: Allied champions around Karma's target become shielded and gain Movement Speed; Enemy units around her target are dealt magic damage.

spells.name: Dredge Line
spells.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor and the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

spells.name: Titan's Wrath
spells.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} plus 10% of his bonus health (+{{ f1 }}) damage for up to {{ e3 }} seconds.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks apply a damage over time effect to all units around his target. The effect deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds.

spells.name: Riptide
spells.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

spells.name: Depth Charge
spells.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through and knocks them into the air.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Light Binding
spells.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
spells.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The second enemy receives {{ e2 }}% of the effect.

spells.name: Prismatic Barrier
spells.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
spells.tooltip: Throws Lux's wand to a target location and back, protecting herself and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Lucent Singularity
spells.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
spells.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

spells.name: Final Spark
spells.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
spells.tooltip: Channels a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

spells.name: Orb of Deception
spells.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on the way out, and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage on the way back.

spells.name: Fox-Fire
spells.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.

spells.name: Charm
spells.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her. Ahri deals additional damage to recently charmed enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).

Enemies hit by Charm take 20% more magic damage from Ahri for 6 seconds. Orb of Deception's true damage is also increased by this effect.

spells.name: Spirit Rush
spells.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
spells.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

spells.name: Undertow
spells.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to units it passes through and slowing their movement speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than {{ e4 }} second.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

spells.name: Vicious Strikes
spells.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Lifesteal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much health he is missing.
spells.tooltip:
For 6 seconds, Olaf gains {{ e2 }}% Lifesteal and Attack Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}%.

During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every {{ e3 }}% of Health he is missing.

spells.name: Reckless Swing
spells.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to {{ e2 }}% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target.

Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.

spells.name: Ragnarok
spells.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables and gains bonus Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor and {{ e1 }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e2 }} seconds. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage.

spells.name: Power Transfer
spells.description: Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, returning a portion of the damage dealt as a shield.
spells.tooltip: Viktor blasts an enemy unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, returning {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) as a shield.

spells.name: Gravity Field
spells.description: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows any target in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.
spells.tooltip: Viktor conjures a gravitational imprisonment device for 4 seconds, slowing all enemies by {{ e4 }}% of their Movement Speed and stacks every {{ e1 }} seconds. At {{ e3 }} stacks the target will be stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Death Ray
spells.description: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to any opponents struck in its path.
spells.tooltip: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

spells.name: Chaos Storm
spells.description: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and briefly silences enemies. The singularity then does magic damage to all nearby enemies every second. Viktor can redirect the singularity.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing enemies in the area for {{ e5 }} seconds.

As it churns, it deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second to nearby enemies for {{ e4 }} seconds. The storm moves faster the closer it is to Viktor.

Activating this ability again while the singularity is active will redirect it.

spells.name: Flash Frost
spells.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
spells.tooltip:
A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and chilling targets, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for {{ e4 }} second.

spells.name: Crystallize
spells.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
spells.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a medium amount of damage. If the target has been slowed by Flash Frost or Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If the target has been slowed by Flash Frost or Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

spells.name: Glacial Storm
spells.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and chilling targets, slowing their Attack and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

spells.name: Decisive Strike
spells.description: Garen gains a burst of Movement Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him and his next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
spells.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him and gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ e6 }} seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Courage
spells.description: Garen passively increases his Armor and Magic Resist. He may also activate this ability to grant himself a shield that reduces incoming damage and crowd control durations for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Garen's gains an additional 20% value from bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

Active: Garen gains a defensive shield for {{ e4 }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}% and granting 30% crowd control duration reduction.

spells.name: Judgment
spells.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack (+{{ f1 }}) as physical damage to nearby enemies every second. Garen can move through units while spinning but moves 20% slower when travelling directly through units.

Judgment can critically strike dealing bonus damage.
Judgment deals 25% less damage to minions.

spells.name: Demacian Justice
spells.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much Health his target has missing.
spells.tooltip: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage plus 1 damage for every {{ e2 }} Health the target is missing.

spells.name: Poison Trail
spells.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

spells.name: Mega Adhesive
spells.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing enemies who walk on it.
spells.tooltip: Leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e1 }}% (lasts {{ e3 }} second after leaving).

spells.name: Fling
spells.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed.
spells.tooltip: Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Insanity Potion
spells.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
spells.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regeneration, and Mana Regeneration for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ice Shard
spells.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
spells.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

spells.name: Ring of Frost
spells.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Path
spells.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
spells.tooltip: Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

spells.name: Frozen Tomb
spells.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ e4 }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ e5 }} seconds, becoming untargetable and invulnerable but unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ e3 }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Arcane Smash
spells.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Twisted Advance
spells.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.
spells.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Sapling Toss
spells.description: Maokai flings a sapling that deals area damage on impact. The sapling then wards the nearby area. When enemies approach, the sapling attacks enemies with an arcane blast.
spells.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact.

The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Vengeful Maelstrom
spells.description: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells and attacks, reducing non-tower damage done to allied champions in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to deal damage to enemies within the vortex.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Maokai creates a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}%.

Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.

spells.name: Dark Binding
spells.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Tormented Soil
spells.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
spells.tooltip:
Curses an area for 5 seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

spells.name: Black Shield
spells.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

spells.name: Soul Shackles
spells.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
spells.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by 20% for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

spells.name: Hate Spike
spells.description: Evelynn fires a line of spikes through an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn fires a line of spikes through a nearby enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path.

Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

spells.name: Dark Frenzy
spells.description: Evelynn passively increases her Movement Speed when hitting enemy champions with her spells. Upon activation, Evelynn breaks free from slows affecting her and gains a massive Movement Speed boost for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Evelynn's spell hits on enemy champions grant her {{ e1 }} Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds (effect stacks up to {{ e5 }} times).

Active: Evelynn removes all slows affecting her and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Champion kills and assists refresh Dark Frenzy's cooldown.

spells.name: Ravage
spells.description: Evelynn slashes her target twice, dealing damage with each hit. She then gains increased Attack Speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Evelynn slashes a target {{ e3 }} times, dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Evelynn then gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Agony's Embrace
spells.description: Evelynn summons spikes from the ground to deal damage and slow enemies in the area. She then gains a shield based on how many enemy champions were hit.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn impales all enemies in the targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their current Health in magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Evelynn siphons their pain, gaining a {{ e4 }} health shield for each enemy champion hit which lasts up to 6 seconds.

spells.name: Urchin Strike
spells.description: Fizz strikes his target and runs them through, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
spells.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing normal attack damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This ability can trigger on-hit effects.

spells.name: Seastone Trident
spells.description: Fizz's Trident causes rending wounds in his opponents, dealing magic damage to the target based on their missing health and reducing their healing and regeneration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's attacks rend his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health as magic damage over {{ e4 }} seconds. (Max 300 vs. minions)

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Fizz's attacks deal an additional {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit and apply Grievous Wounds to his target, reducing incoming healing by 50%.

spells.name: Playful / Trickster
spells.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and  becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
spells.tooltip:
Fizz hops toward your cursor onto his spear, becoming untargetable, and then slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Reactivating this ability while Fizz is on top of his spear causes Fizz to jump again towards your cursor and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a smaller area to enemies nearby, instead of slamming the ground.

spells.name: Chum the Waters
spells.description: Fizz unleashes a magical fish that latches onto enemies or hovers over terrain, slowing champions if it is latched on to them. After a brief delay, a shark erupts from beneath the earth, dealing damage to enemies around the fish and knocking them aside.
spells.tooltip:
Fizz releases a magical fish toward a location that can bind itself onto enemy champions, slowing their movement by {{ e2 }}%. If the fish misses an enemy champion, it will remain on the ground for a brief time, binding to any enemy champion walking over it.

After {{ e3 }} seconds, a shark erupts from the earth, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a large area, knocking up the target the fish is attached to, knocking other enemies aside and reducing the movement speed of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Razor Shuriken
spells.description: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
spells.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to each additional enemy.

Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 50% less damage than the previous shuriken.

spells.name: Living Shadow
spells.description: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow. Zed's Attack Damage is passively increased.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% additional bonus Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}).

Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds.
Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Zed's shadows mimic his abilities. If an ability strikes any target twice, Zed restores {{ e3 }} energy. Energy can only be restored once per mimicked ability.

spells.name: Shadow Slash
spells.description: Zed and his shadow spins their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
spells.tooltip:
Zed and his shadow slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's Shadow Slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.
Each enemy hit by a mimicked Shadow Slash will be slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Enemies hit by both Shadow Slashes will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% but will not take additional damage.

spells.name: Death Mark
spells.description: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active.
spells.tooltip:
Zed briefly becomes untargetable and spawns a Shadow at his location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds.

He then dashes to the target and marks them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of all magic and physical damage dealt to the target by Zed and his shadows while the mark was active.

Reactivating Death Mark will cause Zed to switch positions with this Shadow.

spells.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
spells.description: Heimerdinger lays down a machine gun turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack.  (Turrets deal half damage to towers).
spells.tooltip:
Places a Turret at target location. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Their Health increases with Heimerdinger's champion level and they shut down if he moves out of the area. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold {{ e3 }} Kit(s) at once.

H-28G Evolution Turret Stats
Health: {{ f4 }}
Attack - Cannon: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each attack.
Attack - Beam: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage in a line every {{ f2 }} seconds.
Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

spells.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
spells.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards your cursor and fan out past it. Each rocket deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Units hit multiple times take reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, max {{ e6 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.
Minions: 60% of base damage.

Targeting the rockets closer to Heimerdinger increases their spread.

spells.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
spells.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
spells.tooltip: Hurls a grenade that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: UPGRADE!!!
spells.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
spells.tooltip:
Makes next basic ability free and gives it bonus effects. Reactivate to cancel.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Places a Turret that deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage with its cannon and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage with its beam for 8 seconds. It has splash damage, immunity to disables, its attacks slow targets for 25%, and it doesn't count toward the Turret limit.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that deal {{ e8 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage each. Champions and Monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage, max {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}).

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing {{ e10 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage. Both the stun and slow areas are larger and the slow is improved to 80%.

spells.name: Flamespitter
spells.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals half damage to minions and neutral monsters.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 50% bonus damage.

spells.name: Scrap Shield
spells.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 25% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

spells.name: Electro Harpoon
spells.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. A second shot can be fired within 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 25%.

After using this ability you may cast it a second time at no cost within 3 seconds.

spells.name: The Equalizer
spells.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

spells.name: Mace of Spades
spells.description: On next hit, Mordekaiser swings his mace with such force that it echoes out, striking up to 3 additional nearby targets, dealing damage plus bonus damage. If the target is alone, the attack deals extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
On next hit, Mordekaiser swings his mace with such force that it echoes out, striking up to 3 additional nearby targets, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If the target is alone, {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) damage is dealt instead.

spells.name: Creeping Death
spells.description: Unleashes a protective cloud of metal shards to surround an ally, increasing their armor and magic resistance and dealing damage per second to enemies in the cloud.
spells.tooltip: Unleashes a protective cloud of metal shards to surround an ally for 6 seconds, increasing their armor and magic resistance by {{ e1 }} and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Siphon of Destruction
spells.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
spells.tooltip: Mordekaiser damages enemies in a cone in front of him, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Children of the Grave
spells.description: Mordekaiser curses an enemy, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost for 30 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Steals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of target champion's maximum Health (half stolen initially and half over 10 seconds; deals Magic Damage).

If the target dies while cursed, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost for 30 seconds. Mordekaiser gains 20% of their Ability Power and Attack Damage, and the ghost's stats are enhanced.

The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Hymn of Valor
spells.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, granting nearby allied champions bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Additionally, casting this ability sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to the nearest two enemy champions or monsters.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Aura: Increases the Attack Damage and Ability Power of nearby allied Champions by {{ e1 }}.

Activation: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes Champions).

Power Chord - Staccato: Deals double power chord damage.

spells.name: Aria of Perseverance
spells.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, granting nearby allied champions bonus Armor and Magic Resist. Additionally, casting this ability sends out healing melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Aura: Grants nearby allied Champions {{ e1 }} bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

Activation: Heals Sona and the most wounded nearby allied Champion for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and grants {{ e1 }} additional Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.

Power Chord - Diminuendo: Reduces an enemy's total damage output by 20% (+{{ f1 }}%) for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Song of Celerity
spells.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allied champions bonus Movement Speed. Additionally, casting this ability energizes nearby allies with a burst of speed.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Aura: Grants nearby allied Champions {{ e1 }} bonus Movement Speed.

Activation: Grants nearby allies {{ e2 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.

Power Chord - Tempo: Slows an enemy by 40% (+{{ a1 }}%) for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Crescendo
spells.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, forcing enemy champions to dance and dealing magic damage to them.
spells.tooltip: Strikes an irresistible chord forcing enemy Champions to dance for 1.5 seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Bouncing Blades
spells.description: Katarina throws a dagger that bounces from enemy to enemy, dealing magic damage and marking them. Her next spell or basic attack against a marked target will consume the mark and deal additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Throws a dagger dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The dagger bounces to the 4 closest enemies dealing 10% less damage with each bounce.

Enemies hit are marked for 4 seconds. Katarina's basic attacks or spells will consume the mark dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage.

spells.name: Sinister Steel
spells.description: Katarina whirls her daggers around her, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains a burst of speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Whirls daggers in a circle dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for 1 second.

spells.name: Shunpo
spells.description: Katarina instantly teleports to her target's location and takes reduced damage from enemies for a few seconds. If the target is an enemy, she deals damage.
spells.tooltip:
Teleports to a target's location. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage if the target is an enemy.

After using Shunpo, Katarina takes {{ e2 }}% reduced damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Death Lotus
spells.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers with unrivaled speed at up to three nearby Champions. Daggers deal magic damage and reduce incoming healing on targets hit.
spells.tooltip:
Becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers at the closest 3 enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

Daggers apply Grievous Wounds, reducing incoming healing by 50% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Caustic Spittle
spells.description: Passive: Increases Kog'Maw's Attack Speed. Active: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and reduces the enemy's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
spells.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal additional magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health (Max: 100 Damage vs Monsters). Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Void Ooze
spells.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Living Artillery
spells.description: Kog'Maw fires a living artillery shell at a great distance dealing damage and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional mana.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a living artillery shot from a great distance that lands shortly after launch. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and reveals non-stealthed enemies for 4 seconds (deals {{ e3 }}% bonus damage to Champions).

Subsequent artillery shots within {{ e4 }} seconds cost {{ cost }} additional Mana up to a maximum of {{ e5 }} Mana.

spells.name: Frost Shot
spells.description: While active, each of Ashe's basic attacks slow her targets. This drains Mana with each attack.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks slow enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Volley
spells.description: Ashe fires 7 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Volley also applies Ashe's current level of Frost Shot.
spells.tooltip: Fires arrows in a cone, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Volley applies Frost Shot's slow effect.

spells.name: Hawkshot
spells.description: Ashe gains bonus Gold when killing enemy units or structures. Ashe can activate to send her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }} bonus Gold whenever Ashe kills an enemy unit or structure.

Active: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location. Grants vision for 5 seconds.

Total Gold Retrieved: {{ f1 }} gold.

spells.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
spells.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion for up to 3.5 seconds, based on how far the arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Launches a crystal arrow of ice in a line that stuns an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Surrounding enemies are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds and take half damage.

spells.name: Glitterlance
spells.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). This slow decays over time, to a minimum of ({{ f1 }}%).

An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

spells.name: Whimsy
spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them movement speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base movement speed by {{ e4 }}.

spells.name: Help, Pix!
spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. Upon arrival, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants vision of them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wild Growth
spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Lay Waste
spells.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position. After 0.5 seconds, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy, this deals double damage if it hits only a single unit.

spells.name: Wall of Pain
spells.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spells.tooltip: Creates a wall at target location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

spells.name: Defile
spells.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own mana.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

spells.name: Requiem
spells.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
spells.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

spells.name: Pulverize
spells.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and tossing them into the air. On landing, enemies are stunned.
spells.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and tossing all nearby enemy units into the air, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Headbutt
spells.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
spells.tooltip: Alistar charges at an enemy and rams them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them while knocking them back.

spells.name: Triumphant Roar
spells.description: Alistar lets out a commanding war cry, restoring health to himself and nearby friendly units for half the amount. Can be cast more often if nearby enemies are dying.
spells.tooltip: Restores {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Alistar and half as much to nearby allies. Cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} seconds each time a nearby enemy unit dies.

spells.name: Unbreakable Will
spells.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, gaining bonus damage, removing all crowd-control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Removes disables from Alistar, and Alistar gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and takes {{ e4 }}% reduced physical and magic damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Decimate
spells.description: Darius swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies in a circle. Champions in the outer half of the ability are struck by the blade, taking {{ e1 }}% additional damage.

spells.name: Crippling Strike
spells.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their movement and attack speed is slowed. Crippling Strike's cooldown is lower the more bloodied its target.
spells.tooltip:
The next basic attack deals {{ e4 }}% damage and slows the target's movement and attack speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Crippling Strike's base cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target.

spells.name: Apprehend
spells.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Darius's physical damage ignores {{ e1 }}% of his target's Armor.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius.

spells.name: Noxian Guillotine
spells.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
spells.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage.

For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.
Maximum Damage: {{ f3 }}.

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, Darius may recast Noxian Guillotine for 20 seconds.

spells.name: Tumble
spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
spells.tooltip: Rolls a short distance. The next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, equal to {{ e2 }}% of total Attack Damage.

spells.name: Silver Bolts
spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
spells.tooltip: Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum Health as true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

spells.name: Condemn
spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, dealing damage and knocking them back. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks the enemy back. Enemies that collide with terrain take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) additional physical damage and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Final Hour
spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
spells.tooltip: Gains {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. While active, Tumble grants invisibility for {{ e3 }} second, and Night Hunter's bonus Movement Speed is increased to {{ e4 }}.

spells.name: Piercing Arrow
spells.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).

While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds half its mana cost.

spells.name: Blighted Quiver
spells.description: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack (Max: 360 total damage vs Monsters).

spells.name: Hail of Arrows
spells.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their healing and regeneration.
spells.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

spells.name: Chain of Corruption
spells.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
spells.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions, applying the same damage and immobilize if it reaches them.

spells.name: Tiger Stance
spells.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds, and his first basic attack will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks deal extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, and Udyr will perform a Tiger Strike with his first basic attack, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over 2 seconds.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Turtle Stance
spells.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr gains Life Steal.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Bear Stance
spells.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 6 seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Phoenix Stance
spells.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies for 5 seconds. Persistent Effect - With the first basic attack and every third attack after, Udyr engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Burns enemies in front of Udyr on his first basic attack and every third attack after, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

spells.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
spells.tooltip: Leaps to an enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing attack speed to maximum for several attacks.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the movement speed of all allies who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e4 }}% of the enemy's maximum health (+{{ a1 }}) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. ({{ e1 }} Maximum Damage against monsters)

spells.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon stance reduces the enemy's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

label: Cannon Swap: Armor/Magic Resistance Shred
Hammer Swap: Bonus Damage
Hammer Passive: Bonus Armor and Magic Resist

spells.name: Shield of Daybreak
spells.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
spells.tooltip: The next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns an enemy for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Eclipse
spells.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resistance. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
spells.tooltip: Gains {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus Armor and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Zenith Blade
spells.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
spells.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be briefly rooted and Leona will dash to them.

spells.name: Solar Flare
spells.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

spells.name: Dark Sphere
spells.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ e2 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.

spells.name: Force of Will
spells.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the movement speed of enemies.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the Dark Sphere or enemy minion. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

This spell can be cast while moving.

spells.name: Scatter the Weak
spells.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spells.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unleashed Power
spells.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
spells.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing all Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Spear Shot
spells.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Aegis of Zeonia
spells.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes the enemy with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at the target enemy champion, minion or neutral monster and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

spells.name: Heartseeker Strike
spells.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him, dealing double damage to champions. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and deals {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per strike. Deals double damage to champions.

spells.name: Grand Skyfall
spells.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at the target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

spells.name: Taste Their Fear
spells.description: Kha'Zix passively marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Enlarged Claws, this deals bonus damage against low health targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Marks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased by {{ e2 }}%.

Evolved Enlarged Claws: Deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing Health (can be increased by isolation, max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e5 }}.

spells.name: Void Spike
spells.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and Void Spike's slow effect is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and slowing them for {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and Void Spike's slow is increased to {{ e5 }}%.

spells.name: Leap
spells.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases dramatically. Also, on champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
spells.tooltip:
Leaps to a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.

spells.name: Void Assault
spells.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, and increases Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Active Camouflage, Void Assault can be cast three times and Kha'Zix takes reduced damage while in stealth.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.
