Active: Stealths for {{ e1 }} second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%. Additionally, Kha'Zix ignores unit collision while stealthed. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Active Camouflage: Void Assault can be cast three times, Kha'Zix receives {{ e6 }}% Damage Reduction while stealthed, and the duration of Void Assault increases to {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Broken Wings
spells.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

spells.name: Ki Burst
spells.description: Riven emits a Ki burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Valor
spells.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
spells.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Blade of the Exile
spells.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy and gains attack damage and range. Additionally, during this time, she gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
spells.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much health they are missing.

spells.name: Phosphorus Bomb
spells.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).

spells.name: Valkyrie
spells.description: Corki surges to target location, dropping bombs that create a trail of destruction for opponents who remain in the fire.
spells.tooltip: Corki surges to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

spells.name: Gatling Gun
spells.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy armor.
spells.tooltip: Corki's gatling gun fires at all targets in front of him for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reducing {{ e2 }} armor per second. The armor reduction stacks and lasts 2 seconds.

spells.name: Missile Barrage
spells.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
Corki fires a missile toward his targeted location that will collide with the first enemy it hits. Each missile deals {{ e1 }} {{ f3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) area magic damage.

Corki reloads a missile every {{ f1 }} seconds, up to 7 missiles at any given time.

Every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ e3 }}% extra damage.

spells.name: Piltover Peacemaker
spells.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
spells.tooltip: Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Yordle Snap Trap
spells.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap immobilizes the champion, reveals them for a short duration, and deals magic damage over 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Sets a trap that an enemy Champion can spring immobilizing and revealing them for a short duration. The trap deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds, and lasts for {{ e4 }} minutes. Only 3 traps may be active at once.

spells.name: 90 Caliber Net
spells.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
spells.tooltip: Fires a net dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s). Knocks Caitlyn back.

spells.name: Ace in the Hole
spells.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
spells.tooltip: Takes a second to line up the perfect shot, firing a bullet at an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage at {{ e2 }} range. Other enemy Champions can intercept the bullet.

spells.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies. As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee tosses her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact. If Javelin Toss travels beyond Nidalee's basic attack range, it begins to gain damage, up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (250% of the minimum) total damage at maximum range.

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage based on how low her opponent's life is.

spells.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a damaging trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, reveals the target and reduces their Armor and Magic Resist for 12 seconds. As a cougar, she pounces forward, dealing a small amount of damage when she lands. Pounce is not affected by cooldown reduction.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee lays a trap that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds, reveals the target, and reduces their Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Traps last for {{ e4 }} minutes.

Cougar: Nidalee lunges forward, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

spells.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with attack speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she rapidly claws enemies in front of her.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals an allied champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and grants them a {{ e2 }}% attack speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in front of her.

spells.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
spells.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar, gaining {{ e5 }} Movement Speed, and her basic abilities become Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form.

spells.name: Resolute Smite
spells.description: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, slowing and dealing damage to enemies caught near the impact point.
spells.tooltip: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near the impact location, and reducing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: Galio shields an ally Champion, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance, and restoring Galio's health each time that Champion suffers damage.
spells.tooltip: Galio shields a friendly champion for {{ e4 }} seconds, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e1 }}. Each time the unit suffers damage, Galio is healed for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). (-20% healing for each consecutive hit)

spells.name: Righteous Gust
spells.description: Galio claps his wings, unleashing a gust of concussive wind that damages enemies and leaves a directional draft in its wake that increases ally movement speed.
spells.tooltip: Galio unleashes a gust of concussive wind that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path. A directional draft remains for 5 seconds, increasing the movement speed of allies passing through it by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Idol of Durand
spells.description: Galio assumes the form of a statue, taunting nearby enemies and storing concussive energy as they attack him. Galio then bursts from his statue shell, releasing the stored energy to damage surrounding foes.
spells.tooltip:
Galio channels for 2 seconds, taunting nearby foes and blocking {{ e4 }}% of incoming damage.

After channeling, Galio deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, plus an additional {{ e2 }}% damage for each attack he suffered while channeling. Max {{ e3 }}% bonus damage.

spells.name: Thundering Shuriken
spells.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
spells.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

spells.name: Electrical Surge
spells.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of his attack damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby targets afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Lightning Rush
spells.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Any enemy unit he runs through takes damage and gets a Mark of the Storm.
spells.tooltip:
Kennen gains 335 movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.
Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.

spells.name: Slicing Maelstrom
spells.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at random nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
spells.tooltip: Summons a magical storm that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a random enemy champion near Kennen every {{ e2 }} seconds. This storm attacks up to {{ e3 }} times and cannot hit the same target more than 3 times.

spells.name: Baleful Strike
spells.description: Unleashes dark energy at target enemy, dealing magic damage. If a unit is killed, Veigar gains some Ability Power permanently.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Unleashes dark energy at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If the target is killed, Veigar gains 1 Ability Power. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

Passive: Veigar gains {{ e2 }} Ability Power when he kills a champion from any source of damage.

Ability Power bonus: +{{ f1 }}

spells.name: Dark Matter

spells.tooltip: After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Event Horizon

spells.tooltip: Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Primordial Burst
spells.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large base amount of magic damage plus 80% of his target's AP.
spells.tooltip: Blasts an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus 80% of his target's Ability Power in magic damage.

spells.name: Buckshot

spells.tooltip: Shoots three bullets in a cone, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all enemies in their path. Enemies hit with multiple bullets take {{ e4 }}% damage from each additional bullet.

spells.name: Smoke Screen
spells.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact and creates a smoke cloud that lasts {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies inside the cloud are slowed by {{ e2 }}% and have their sight radius reduced.

spells.name: Quickdraw
spells.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Attack Speed boost for several seconds. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill.
spells.tooltip: Dashes forward, gaining {{ e1 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} second.

spells.name: Collateral Damage
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

spells.name: Call of the Void
spells.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal magic damage and silence enemy champions.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silence champions for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Null Zone
spells.description: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy which damages enemies that stand in it.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy for {{ e3 }} seconds. The zone damages nearby enemies for {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health each second (damage to Monsters is capped at {{ e4 }} damage per second).

spells.name: Malefic Visions
spells.description: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage each second. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
spells.tooltip:
Malzahar infects his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

If the target dies during this time, the visions pass to a nearby enemy and Malzahar gains {{ e2 }} mana.

Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

spells.name: Nether Grasp
spells.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion and deal damage each second.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress target champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2.5 seconds.

spells.name: Vault Breaker

spells.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by 15% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals 75% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

spells.name: Denting Blows
spells.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her attack speed.
spells.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by 20% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (max 300 damage vs. minions and monsters).

spells.name: Excessive Force
spells.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
spells.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

spells.name: Assault and Battery
spells.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
spells.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and will knock aside enemies in the way, dealing 75% damage to them.

spells.name: Reckoning
spells.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.
spells.tooltip: Blasts a target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

spells.name: Divine Blessing
spells.description: Blesses a target friendly champion, granting them increased movement speed and healing them.
spells.tooltip: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} seconds and healing them for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health.

spells.name: Righteous Fury
spells.description: Ignites Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged splash attack and bonus magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and her basic attack deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on hit.

In addition, enemies near her target take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on attack.

spells.name: Intervention
spells.description: Shields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.
spells.tooltip: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bladesurge
spells.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.

spells.name: Hiten Style
spells.description: Irelia is skilled in the art of Hiten, passively giving her physical attacks health restoration. Activating Hiten Style doubles her health restoration and gives her basic attacks true damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks restore {{ e1 }} health.

Active: Irelia's basic attacks deal {{ e2 }} true damage and doubles health restored for 6 seconds.

spells.name: Equilibrium Strike
spells.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead.
spells.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing the target by 60% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns the target for the duration instead.

spells.name: Transcendent Blades
spells.description: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal physical damage and siphon life from enemies they pass through.
spells.tooltip: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for 25% of the damage dealt against champions and 10% against minions and monsters.

spells.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
spells.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health (Max: 400 damage vs. Monsters).

Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

spells.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 5 seconds, Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

spells.name: Tempest / Cripple
spells.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.

spells.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reveals enemy units hit for 4 seconds. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest for 4 seconds, reducing their Movement and Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement and Attack Speed recover gradually over the duration.

spells.name: Dragon's Rage
spells.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
spells.tooltip: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching an enemy champion back, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.

Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain attack speed and heal Elise on each attack.

Elise transforms into a menacing spider, granting access to arachnid abilities.

Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

spells.name: Frenzy

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

spells.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

spells.tooltip: Volibear channels the storm, causing all basic attacks for {{ e3 }} seconds to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, which chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

spells.name: Consume

Commands the yeti to bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage to the target and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Reptiles: Your attacks and spells deal an additional 1% of your maximum health as magic damage.
Golems: 10% increased Size and Maximum Health
Wolves or Wraiths: Killing a unit grants 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds

spells.tooltip: The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ice Blast

spells.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Nunu saps the area of heat, channeling up to {{ e4 }} seconds, slowing surrounding enemy units' Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends receive up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long the spell was channeled.

spells.name: Wild Cards
spells.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
spells.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

spells.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Stacked Deck
spells.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his attack speed is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every {{ e4 }} attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

In addition, his attack speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.tooltip:
Reveals all enemy champions (including stealthed champions) on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Leap Strike

spells.tooltip: Jax leaps to a target unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage if it is an enemy.

spells.name: Empower
spells.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Counter Strike

spells.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking {{ e3 }}% less damage from area effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for {{ e2 }} second and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to them.

spells.name: Grandmaster's Might

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional magic damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Twin Bite

Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage on the second attack. The bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's Attack Damage. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

spells.name: Burnout

spells.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moves {{ e2 }}% faster for 3 seconds. Shyvana's Movement Speed bonus is reduced over time. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second to a maximum of 4 seconds.

spells.name: Flame Breath

spells.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies it passes through, debuffing them for 5 seconds. Basic attacks to debuffed targets deal 2% of their maximum health as magic damage on-hit. (Max: 100 vs monsters)

spells.name: Dragon's Descent

spells.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ e3 }} Fury every 1.5 seconds. Basic Attacks generate {{ e2 }} Fury.

spells.name: Infected Cleaver

spells.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of the target's current Health ({{ e1 }} damage minimum) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Half of the health cost is refunded if the cleaver hits a target.

spells.name: Burning Agony

spells.tooltip: Toggle: Dr. Mundo deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, and reduces the duration of disables on Dr. Mundo by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Masochism
spells.description: Masochism increases Dr. Mundo's Attack Damage by a flat amount for 5 seconds. In addition, Dr. Mundo also gains an additional amount of Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.
spells.tooltip: Increases Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds. Dr. Mundo gains an additional +{{ e3 }} Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.

spells.name: Sadism
spells.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
spells.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates {{ e1 }}% of his maximum Health over {{ e2 }} seconds. Additionally, he gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed.

spells.name: Sear

spells.tooltip:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Pillar of Flame
spells.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
spells.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units within the area.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

spells.name: Conflagration
spells.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Pyroclasm

spells.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces.

spells.name: Crescent Strike
spells.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Pale Cascade

spells.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Moonfall

spells.tooltip: Draws in all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Lunar Rush

spells.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Arctic Assault
spells.description: Charges forward, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.
spells.tooltip: Charges forward, knocking enemies into the air and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} damage to monsters). The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.

spells.name: Flail of the Northern Winds
spells.description: Sejuani's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then spins her flail, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani's next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then swings her flail, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}% bonus HP]) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds.

If this ability is reactivated, Sejuani immediately starts swinging her flail.

spells.name: Permafrost
spells.description: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages and slows all nearby enemies with Frost.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds.

Active: All nearby enemies with Frost take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Prison
spells.description: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows enemies by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds instead.

All enemies in the shatter area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Transfusion
spells.description: Vladimir drains life from his target.
spells.tooltip: Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Sanguine Pool
spells.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable and slowing enemies above him by 40%.

Vladimir deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [15% of bonus Health]) magic damage over the duration and heals himself for 12.5% of that amount.

spells.name: Tides of Blood
spells.description: Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, damaging surrounding enemies. Additionally, multiple Tides of Blood in a short period of time cause them to cost additional health and deal additional damage, and increases his healing and regeneration.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

Each cast gives him an Empowered stack (max 4), increasing his healing and regeneration by {{ e4 }}% each. Additionally, Tides of Blood cost and base damage increases by 25% per stack.

spells.name: Hemoplague
spells.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. Hemoplague deals additional magic damage after a few seconds to infected enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir infects the target area with a virulent plague, causing {{ e4 }}% increased damage for 5 seconds.

After 5 seconds, infected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Stretching Strike
spells.description: Zac extends his arms, slowing and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Smacks enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unstable Matter
spells.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} Magic Damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health as Magic Damage to all nearby enemies (Max: {{ e5 }} damage against minions and monsters).

spells.name: Elastic Slingshot
spells.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
spells.tooltip:
Charges up and launches towards a target area, knocking up enemies.
Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating the ability launches him towards his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and knocking them back for 0.5 seconds.

Can be cancelled by moving, refunding half of the ability's cooldown and cost.

spells.name: Let's Bounce!
spells.description: Zac launches into the air, gaining Movement Speed, and slams down three times, each time damaging, slowing and knocking up nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Zac bounces 4 times, knocking up and slowing enemies.
Each bounce deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, knocks them up for 1 second, and slows them by {{ e5 }}% for 1 second. Enemies hit more than once take half damage and are not knocked up. Upon activation, Zac removes all slows affecting him and gains an accelerating Movement Speed buff ({{ e3 }}-{{ e4 }}%) for the duration.

Zac can right-click to move and can activate Unstable Matter while in the air.

spells.name: Blinding Assault
spells.description: Quinn calls Valor to blind and damage targets in an area.
spells.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line and strikes the first enemy in his path. He then attacks all nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and blinding them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

As Valor: Performs the same attack at the current location.

spells.name: Heightened Senses
spells.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Valor's Attack Speed is permanently increased. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby (does not reveal stealthed units).
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target will increase Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e6 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Passive as Valor: Gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds (does not reveal stealthed units).

spells.name: Vault
spells.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target. Valor will immediately mark this enemy as Vulnerable.
spells.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (this effect diminishes over {{ e3 }} seconds).

Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range from the target. Valor will immediately mark this enemy as Vulnerable.

As Valor: Performs the same attack but does not mark or leap off the target.

spells.name: Tag Team
spells.description: Valor replaces Quinn on the battlefield as a mobile melee attacker. When ready, Quinn returns in a hail of arrows, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Valor replaces Quinn on the battlefield as a mobile melee attacker for {{ e4 }} seconds. Valor can move through units and gains +{{ e3 }}% Movement Speed, decreased gradually to +{{ e5 }}% when in combat.

Second Cast: Quinn returns to perform Skystrike, dealing from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to all enemies in a large area, increasing based on how much health they are missing.

If Skystrike has not been cast before this ability ends, it will be cast automatically.

spells.name: Mark of the Assassin
spells.description: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal magic damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
spells.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to cause {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and restore {{ e2 }} Energy.

spells.name: Twilight Shroud
spells.description: Akali throws down a cover of smoke. While inside the area, Akali gains Armor and Magic Resist and becomes invisible. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.tooltip:
Akali throws down a cover of smoke that lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. While inside the area, Akali gains {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist and becomes invisible. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

Enemies inside the smoke are slowed by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Crescent Slash
spells.description: Akali flourishes her kamas, dealing damage based on her Attack Damage and Ability Power.
spells.tooltip:
Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing nearby enemy units for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Triggers Mark of the Assassin on targets affected by it.

spells.name: Shadow Dance
spells.description: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges both periodically and upon kills and assists, max 3 stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

spells.name: Rapid Fire
spells.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her attack speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Increases Tristana's attack speed by {{ e1 }}% for 7 seconds.

spells.name: Rocket Jump
spells.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel herself to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for 3 seconds where she lands.
spells.tooltip:
Tristana fires at the ground to propel herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing surrounding units by 60% for 2.5 seconds when she lands.
On a champion kill or assist, Rocket Jump's cooldown resets.

spells.name: Explosive Shot
spells.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to deal damage to target unit over time, and reduce healing received.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Rends target enemy, reducing healing and health regeneration by 50% and dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 5 seconds.

spells.name: Buster Shot
spells.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals magic damage and knocks the target back.
spells.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.

spells.name: Rampage
spells.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions and monsters)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.

spells.name: Spirit of Dread
spells.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} health from minions or monsters.

spells.name: Devastating Charge
spells.description: Hecarim gains increasing movement speed for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge.

spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows
spells.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to anyone they strike.

Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from Hecarim for {{ e2 }} second.

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

spells.name: Boomerang Blade
spells.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
spells.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target hit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Ricochet
spells.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
spells.tooltip:
Sivir's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage to the first target and {{ f2 }} ({{ e3 }}% of total Attack Damage) physical damage to each subsequent target.

Only the first target is affected by on-hit effects. Each target may only be hit once by each Ricochet.

spells.name: Spell Shield
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
spells.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

spells.name: On The Hunt
spells.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Piercing Light
spells.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
spells.tooltip: Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. Deals 75% damage to minions.

spells.name: Ardent Blaze
spells.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

Damaging marked targets grants Lucian {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Relentless Pursuit
spells.description: Lucian dashes a short distance, removing all slow effects.
spells.tooltip:
Dashes a short distance, removing all slow effects.

If Lucian kills an enemy while The Culling is active, the cooldown of Relentless Pursuit is reset.

spells.name: The Culling
spells.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
spells.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ e1 }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. The number of shots scales with his Attack Speed. The Culling does 400% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

spells.name: Savagery
spells.description:
Rengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage and grants him increased Attack Speed.
Ferocity Bonus: Rengar deals enhanced damage and doubles his Attack Speed bonus.
spells.tooltip:
The next basic attack within 2 seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Grants {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity bonus: Additionally deals {{ e2 }}% of Rengar's Attack Damage {{ f1 }} in bonus damage, and the Attack Speed bonus is doubled.

spells.name: Battle Roar
spells.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and gaining bonus Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Rengar heals based on his level and missing health.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Grants {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic resist for 3 seconds if an enemy is hit.

Ferocity bonus: Rengar restores {{ f1 }} of his missing Health.

spells.name: Bola Strike
spells.description:
Rengar throws a bola at his target, slowing them for a short duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Roots the target for 1 second.
spells.tooltip:
Throws a bola dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}%, enemy Movement Speed recovers over 2.5 seconds.

Ferocity bonus: Roots the target for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spells.description: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, stealthing and revealing all enemy Champions in a large radius around him. He gains Movement Speed and rapidly generates Ferocity while stealthed.
spells.tooltip:
Activates predatory instincts stealthing Rengar after 1 second (delayed up to 3 seconds if taking damage), and revealing enemy Champions within {{ e3 }} range.

Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and 5 Ferocity over 3.75 seconds. Lasts {{ f1 }} seconds or until Rengar uses an ability that removes his stealth.

spells.name: Hungering Strike
spells.description: Takes a bite out of an enemy unit and heals Warwick.
spells.tooltip: Strikes an enemy for the greater value between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }}) of the target's maximum Health as magic damage (can only do flat damage to monsters), and heals Warwick for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

spells.name: Hunters Call
spells.description: Warwick lets out a howl, increasing all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Warwick lets out a howl that inspires all nearby allied champions, increasing Warwick's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed by half of that for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Blood Scent
spells.description: Warwick passively senses weakened enemy champions around him. The scent of blood sends him into a fury, causing him to move at incredible speeds.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Warwick senses enemy champions under 50% Health within {{ e1 }} distance of him; while he detects a low-health enemy, he reveals them if they are not stealthed and gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

spells.name: Infinite Duress
spells.description: Warwick lunges at an enemy champion, suppressing his target and dealing magic damage for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Warwick lunges in front of an enemy champion and suppresses them for {{ e2 }} seconds. During this time, Warwick attacks his victim {{ e4 }} times, dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage (triggers on-hit effects {{ e4 }} times).

Warwick gains {{ e3 }}% Life Steal for the duration.

spells.name: Crystal Slash
spells.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck.  If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage. Whenever he hits a target with Crystal Slash he gains a stacking buff that increases his Attack Speed for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds and gains {{ e8 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e9 }} seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
spells.description: Skarner gains a shield, and while the shield persists his Movement Speed is increased.
spells.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains {{ e5 }}% increased Movement Speed that ramps up over 3 seconds.

spells.name: Fracture
spells.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them.
spells.tooltip: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

spells.name: Impale
spells.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals magic damage to it.  During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him.  When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Seismic Shard
spells.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing movement speed for 4 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Brutal Strikes
spells.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Activating Brutal Strikes greatly increases his Armor and Attack Damage for a short amount of time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's basic attacks hit units near his target for {{ e1 }}% of his Attack Damage.

Active: Malphite's Armor and Attack Damage increase by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ground Slam
spells.description: Malphite slams the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spells.tooltip: Malphite charges toward the target area, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking enemies into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Steel Tempest
spells.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
spells.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 10 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by attack speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Dashing builds an extra {{ e3 }}% of your maximum Flow.

Active: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Sweeping Blade
spells.description: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating magic damage with each cast.
spells.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base damage by 25%, up to 100%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

spells.name: Last Breath
spells.description: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
spells.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For 15 seconds, Yasuo gains {{ e5 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.

spells.name: Arcanopulse
spells.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
spells.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the mana cost is refunded.

spells.name: Eye of Destruction
spells.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
spells.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by 10% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Shocking Orb
spells.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
spells.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between 0.75 and 2 seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.

spells.name: Rite of the Arcane
spells.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains three shots of a long-range attack.
spells.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If Xerath does not fire off a single Arcane Barrage, half of the cooldown of Rite of the Arcane is refunded.

spells.name: Blinding Dart
spells.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and blinds the target for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Move Quick
spells.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his movement speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus movement speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 3 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

spells.name: Toxic Shot
spells.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Noxious Trap
spells.description: Teemo places an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time.
spells.tooltip:
Uses a stored mushroom to place a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows movement speed by {{ e2 }}% and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

spells.name: Siphoning Strike
spells.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

spells.name: Wither
spells.description: Nasus ages his target, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
spells.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

spells.name: Spirit Fire
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

spells.name: Fury of the Sands
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Attack Range by {{ e2 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.

spells.name: Cull the Meek
spells.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him and healing for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
spells.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and gains 5% of the damage dealt as Health (20% for champions), up to {{ e2 }}.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Heal percent increased to 10%, up to {{ e3 }}.

spells.name: Ruthless Predator
spells.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e3 }} + {{ e2 }}% of his Attack Damage) and stuns for 0.75 seconds. Each hit applies on-hit effects.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, dealing {{ f2 }} physical damage ({{ e4 }} + {{ e1 }}% of his Attack Damage) and stuns his target for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Slice and Dice
spells.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the armor of units hit.
spells.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Dominus
spells.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
spells.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.

spells.name: Spinning Axe
spells.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spells.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e2 }}% of his total Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

spells.name: Blood Rush
spells.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spells.tooltip:
Draven gains {{ e2 }}% increased Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration.

Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

spells.name: Stand Aside
spells.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Whirling Death
spells.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
spells.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 8% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

spells.name: Deceive
spells.description: Shaco becomes invisible and teleports to target location. His next attack is guaranteed to critically strike.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes invisible for 3.5 seconds.

His next basic attack within the next 6 seconds will critically strike, dealing {{ e1 }}% damage (normal critical strikes deal {{ e2 }}% damage).

spells.name: Jack In The Box
spells.description: Shaco creates an animated Jack-in-the-Box at target location, which will wait, invisible, to Fear nearby units and attack them when some come nearby.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box at the target location. It will become invisible after 2 seconds, and pop out when an enemy comes near, fearing nearby enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacking them.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and it lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds while invisible or 5 seconds while firing.

spells.name: Two-Shiv Poison
spells.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing them and applying a miss chance to minions. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Also reduces minions' chance to hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target enemy and reduces their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Hallucinate
spells.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies. (Deals half damage to turrets.)  Upon death, it explodes, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone that lasts up to 18 seconds. The clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

On death, the clone detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Decrepify
spells.description: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target is damaged and slowed.
spells.tooltip: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and is slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Nevermove
spells.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
spells.tooltip: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Torment
spells.description: Swain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain.
spells.tooltip: Swain afflicts his target for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Swain deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the afflicted target.

spells.name: Ravenous Flock
spells.description: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 3 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain for half of the damage dealt.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Swain transforms into the form of a raven. During this time, up to 3 lesser ravens strike out at nearby enemies each second, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and heals Swain for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions, and {{ e5 }}% against minions.

The cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by {{ e4 }} mana each second.
spells.resource: {{ e2 }} Initial Mana Cost Per Second

spells.name: Bouncing Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Satchel Charge
spells.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away.

Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

spells.name: Hexplosive Minefield
spells.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take 40% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies farther away take {{ e2 }}% damage. Minions take double damage.

spells.name: Howling Gale
spells.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path and knocks them into the air. The whirlwind travels farther, deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage, and knocks enemies higher, for each second it charges (up to a maximum of 3 seconds).

Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

spells.name: Zephyr
spells.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) and allows movement through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.

spells.name: Eye Of The Storm
spells.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

spells.name: Monsoon
spells.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Noxian Diplomacy
spells.description: Talon's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage. If the target is a champion, they will bleed, taking additional physical damage over a period of time and revealing their location for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Talon's next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If the target is a champion, the target will bleed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds, revealing their location for the duration.

spells.name: Rake
spells.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cutthroat
spells.description: Talon instantly appears behind his target, silencing them and amplifying his damage against that target.
spells.tooltip: Talon teleports to the far side of his target, silencing them for {{ e1 }} second and amplifying Talon's damage against the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Shadow Assault
spells.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
spells.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through.

spells.name: Command: Attack
spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her ball remains at the target location after.
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

spells.name: Command: Dissonance
spells.description: Orianna commands the ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

spells.name: Command: Protect
spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: The ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Command: Shockwave
spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the ball after a short delay.
spells.tooltip: Orianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the ball.

spells.name: Terrify
spells.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Strikes a target enemy unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Drain
spells.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to target unit and heals Fiddlesticks for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.
Lasts up to 5 seconds.

spells.name: Dark Wind
spells.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.tooltip:
Strikes an enemy target and then bounces to a nearby enemy unit. Deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silences for 1.2 seconds for each strike.

Can bounce up to {{ e1 }} times and may strike the same target multiple times. Damage to minions and neutral monsters is increased by 50%.

spells.name: Crowstorm
