spells.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage each second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.tooltip: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks for 5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to all enemy units in the area. This has a 1.5 second channel duration and teleports Fiddlesticks to target location.

spells.name: Lunge
spells.description: Fiora dashes forward to strike her target, dealing physical damage. Fiora can perform the dash a second time within a couple seconds at no mana cost.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Fiora can perform the dash a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds at no mana cost.

spells.name: Riposte
spells.description: Fiora's Attack Damage is increased. When activated, Fiora parries the next basic attack and reflects magic damage back to the attacker. Works against champions, large monsters and large minions.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Fiora's Attack Damage is increased by {{ e1 }}.

Active: Fiora parries the next basic attack within {{ e2 }} seconds and reflects {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage back to the attacker. Works against champions, large monsters, and large minions.

spells.name: Burst of Speed
spells.description: Fiora temporarily gains additional Attack Speed. Each basic attack or Lunge she lands during this time increases her Movement Speed. Killing a champion refreshes the cooldown on Burst of Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora gains {{ e1 }}% additional Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Each basic attack or Lunge she lands during this time increases her Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e5 }} times.

Killing a champion refreshes the cooldown on Burst of Speed. (Assists reduce the cooldown by half of the base amount.)

spells.name: Blade Waltz
spells.description: Fiora dashes around the battlefield to deal physical damage to enemy champions. Successive strikes against the same target deal less damage.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora dashes around the battlefield striking random champions {{ e1 }} times for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Successive strikes against the same target deal {{ e3 }}% damage.

The first and last attack will be against the same target. Each strike applies on-hit effects.

spells.name: Rupture
spells.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Feral Scream
spells.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Vorpal Spikes
spells.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath levels.

spells.name: Feast
spells.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum health (maximum 6 stacks). Cho'Gath loses half of his stacks upon death.
spells.tooltip:
Hungrily devours an enemy dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to Champions, or 1000 (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to minions and monsters.

If the enemy is killed by Feast, Cho'Gath grows, gaining {{ e3 }} maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Loses half of his stacks on death.

spells.name: Powerball
spells.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball over {{ e4 }} seconds towards his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on impact and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Activating Defensive Ball Curl will remove this effect.

spells.name: Defensive Ball Curl
spells.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resist, while returning damage to attacks.
spells.tooltip:
Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e4 }}% of Armor.

Activating Powerball will remove this effect.

spells.name: Puncturing Taunt
spells.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.
spells.tooltip: Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).

spells.name: Tremors
spells.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.
spells.tooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Sigil of Silence
spells.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the sigil will trigger, dealing damage and silencing the target.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks the target for 3.5 seconds.

If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the mark will trigger, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silencing the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Distortion
spells.description: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 3 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
spells.tooltip:
Dashes to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby units.

For 3 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

spells.name: Ethereal Chains
spells.description: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and slow their movement speed by 25%. If the target remains shackled for 2 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
spells.tooltip:
Launches a chain that shackles the first unit hit to Leblanc, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their movement speed by 25%.

If the target remains shackled for {{ e2 }} seconds they take an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are unable to move for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Mimic
spells.description: LeBlanc can cast a mimicked version of the previous spell she cast.
spells.tooltip:
LeBlanc can cast a mimicked version of the previous spell she cast.

Mimicked Sigil of Silence and Ethereal Chains deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on both instances of their damage.

Mimicked Distortion deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Time Bomb
spells.description: Places a bomb on any unit, allied or enemy, which detonates after 4 seconds, dealing area of effect damage.
spells.tooltip: Zilean places a time-delayed bomb on a target. After {{ e2 }} seconds this bomb will detonate, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

spells.name: Rewind
spells.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of all of his other abilities.
spells.tooltip: Reduces all of Zilean's other spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Time Warp
spells.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Chronoshift
spells.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
spells.tooltip: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, regaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

spells.name: Starcall
spells.description: A shower of stars falls from the sky, striking all nearby enemies for magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for a short duration. If Starcall hits an enemy champion the cooldown on Astral Blessing is reduced.
spells.tooltip:
Strikes all nearby enemies dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and reduces their Magic Resist by {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks up to {{ e5 }} times).

If Starcall hits at least one enemy champion, Astral Blessing's cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Astral Blessing
spells.description: Soraka blesses a friendly unit, restoring health and increasing Armor for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, and temporarily grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus Armor to an ally for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Infuse
spells.description: Restores Mana to an ally, or deals damage to an enemy and silences them for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Donates up to {{ f3 }} Mana to restore {{ f4 }} Mana ({{ e5 }} plus 5% of Soraka's maximum Mana) to an ally Champion.

On Enemy Cast: Deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and silences them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
spells.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to instantly restore {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to all allied Champions.

spells.name: Duskbringer
spells.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

spells.name: Shroud of Darkness
spells.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne has {{ e1 }}% bonus Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Unspeakable Horror
spells.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and fearing the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
spells.tooltip: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes feared for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Paranoia
spells.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
spells.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Switcheroo!
spells.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain mana.
spells.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% damage to Jinx's target and all nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, and drain mana.

Minigun: Basic attacks grant additional Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ e1 }}%. Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

spells.name: Zap!
spells.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it if it is not stealthed.
spells.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it if it is not stealthed and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Flame Chompers!
spells.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
spells.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
spells.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing health.
spells.tooltip: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Physical Damage plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing health. Nearby enemies take 80% damage.

spells.name: Omen of War
spells.description: Yorick's next attack will deal bonus physical damage and summon a Spectral Ghoul that deals additional damage and moves faster than Yorick's other ghouls. While the Spectral Ghoul is alive, Yorick moves faster as well.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick's next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and summon a Spectral Ghoul for up to 5 seconds.

The Spectral Ghoul deals {{ e2 }} additional damage per hit and moves {{ e3 }}% faster. While the ghoul is active, Yorick moves {{ e3 }}% faster as well.

spells.name: Omen of Pestilence
spells.description: Yorick summons a Decaying Ghoul that arrives with a violent explosion, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies. While the Decaying Ghoul remains alive, nearby enemies continue to be slowed.
spells.tooltip: Yorick summons a Decaying Ghoul that arrives with a violent explosion, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing nearby enemies by {{ e1 }}% for 1.5 seconds. While the Decaying Ghoul remains alive, nearby enemies continue to be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for up to 5 seconds.

spells.name: Omen of Famine
spells.description: Yorick steals life from his target and summons a Ravenous Ghoul that heals Yorick for the damage it deals.
spells.tooltip: Yorick deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and heals for up to {{ e5 }}% of the damage dealt. A Ravenous Ghoul is summoned behind his target for up to 5 seconds, healing Yorick for the damage it deals (healing from ghoul damage halved against minions and monsters).

spells.name: Omen of Death
spells.description: Yorick conjures a revenant in the image of one of his allies. If his ally dies while its revenant is alive, the revenant sacrifices itself to reanimate them and give them time to enact vengeance.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick conjures a revenant in the image of a target allied champion. Revenants deal {{ e1 }}% of target ally's Attack Damage and last for {{ e4 }} seconds. If his ally dies while its revenant is alive, the revenant sacrifices itself to reanimate them for up to {{ e4 }} seconds.

The revenant can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Acid Hunter
spells.description: Urgot fires an Acid Hunter missile that collides with the first enemy it hits, slowing the target if he has his Terror Capacitor up. Acid Hunter missile-locks on enemies affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot fires a missile toward the cursor that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Missile-lock can be achieved by holding the cursor over a target afflicted by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

spells.name: Terror Capacitor
spells.description: Urgot charges up his capacitor to gain a shield. While the shield is active, Urgot gains slowing attacks.
spells.tooltip: Urgot charges up his terror capacitor to gain a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 7 seconds. While the shield is active, Urgot's attacks and missiles slow targets by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Noxian Corrosive Charge
spells.description: Urgot launches a corrosive charge that damages enemies in an area and reduces their armor.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot launches a Corrosive Charge at a target location. Enemies afflicted by the charge have their armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

Acid Hunter is able to missile-lock onto targets affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

spells.name: Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser
spells.description: Urgot charges up his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser, swapping positions with the target. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel. He gains increased Armor and Magic Resist after the swap.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot targets an enemy champion and channels his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser for 1 second, swapping locations with his target afterward. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel.

Urgot gains {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist during and after the channel, and his target is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after being swapped.

spells.name: Double Up
spells.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires a shot at an enemy target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and {{ e2 }}% of that damage to another enemy target behind the first. Applies on-hit effects.

spells.name: Impure Shots
spells.description: Miss Fortune passively increases damage dealt to a target with each strike.  This ability can be activated to increase Miss Fortune's Attack Speed and cause her attacks to lower healing received by the target.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Miss Fortune deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to her target with each attack, cumulatively stacking up to {{ e4 }} times on the same target.
Maximum bonus damage: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }})

Active: Miss Fortune's Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 6 seconds and causes her attacks to lower healing received and health regeneration of the target by 50% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Make It Rain
spells.description: Miss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires hundreds of bullets into the air that rain down at a location after 0.5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 1 second.

spells.name: Bullet Time
spells.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per bullet.

spells.name: Crushing Blow
spells.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} Attack Range, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Decoy
spells.description: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal magic damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Nimbus Strike
spells.description: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
spells.tooltip: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each enemy struck. Upon hitting his target, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains movement speed over the duration of the spell.
spells.tooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per second and knocking up enemies he encounters. Wukong gains speed over the duration of the spell. Lasts 4 seconds.

spells.name: Rocket Grab
spells.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank fires his right hand, if it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.

spells.name: Overdrive
spells.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased movement and attack speed.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank supercharges himself to increase Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and attack speed by {{ e2 }}% for 8 seconds.

spells.name: Power Fist
spells.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

spells.name: Static Field
spells.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

spells.name: Vorpal Blade
spells.description: Damages and life taps a target unit, healing allies that attack the target.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target unit and marks them for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Allied spells and attacks against this target heal the attackers {{ f1 }} ({{ e2 }} + {{ f2 }} [{{ e3 }}% of Shen's max Health]) over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Killing an enemy with Vorpal Blade restores {{ f3 }} Health instantly instead.

spells.name: Feint
spells.description: Shen shields himself, absorbing incoming damage for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Shen shields himself, absorbing the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds.

While Feint holds, his attacks reduce Ki Strike's cooldown by an additional {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Shadow Dash
spells.description: Shen dashes rapidly toward a target location, taunting enemy champions he encounters and dealing minor damage.
spells.tooltip:
Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to champions and taunting champions he collides with for {{ e1 }} second(s).

Taunted enemies are forced to attack Shen and their basic attacks deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Restores {{ e2 }} Energy per champion affected.

spells.name: Stand United
spells.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
spells.tooltip: Places a shield on target allied champion, absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds. After channeling for {{ e3 }} seconds, Shen teleports to the target's location.

spells.name: Three Talon Strike
spells.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air.

spells.name: Battle Cry
spells.description: Xin Zhao passively heals every 3 attacks and can activate this ability to attack faster.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Xin Zhao heals himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) every third basic attack.

Active: Xin Zhao unleashes a battle cry, increasing his Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Audacious Charge
spells.description: Xin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.
spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Crescent Sweep
spells.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist based on number of champions hit.
spells.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) plus 15% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks enemies back (max 600 vs minions and monsters). Xin Zhao gains {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds for each champion hit.

Challenge: If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.

spells.name: Ambush
spells.description: Twitch becomes invisible for a short duration, while invisible Twitch gains movement speed. When leaving invisibility twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
After {{ e4 }} seconds of not taking damage or after {{ e5 }} seconds, Twitch turns invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Twitch gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed while invisible and gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after coming out of invisibility.

spells.name: Venom Cask
spells.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
spells.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area adding {{ e1 }} stacks of Deadly Venom and slowing targets by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Expunge
spells.description: All nearby enemies secrete Twitch's toxic venoms from their bodies, dealing damage for each stack.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom.

spells.name: Spray and Pray
spells.description: Twitch closes his eyes and fires his crossbow, rapidly spraying powerful piercing bolts ahead of him.
spells.tooltip: For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range, {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

spells.name: Alpha Strike
spells.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path. Alpha strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to 4 enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each and an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second.

spells.name: Meditate
spells.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by 1% for every 1% of Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by {{ e3 }}%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets.

spells.name: Wuju Style
spells.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal bonus {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

spells.name: Highlander
spells.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extends Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to movement reduction effects for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Imbue
spells.description: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal an ally and himself. This heal is more potent when Taric heals only himself.
spells.tooltip: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal a target ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e6 }}% of Taric's bonus health). If he targets himself, the heal increases by {{ e4 }}% restoring {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) health.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Taric is protected by a hardening aura, increasing the Armor of himself and nearby allied champions. He may choose to splinter the enchanted rocks surrounding him to deal damage and decrease the Armor of nearby enemies at the cost of some Armor for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Taric's gemstones increase his Armor by {{ e3 }}. Additionally, nearby allied champions gain {{ f1 }} Armor ({{ e4 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Taric shatters his armor, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) for {{ e5 }} seconds. Taric loses {{ e3 }} Armor while Shatter is on cooldown.

spells.name: Dazzle
spells.description: Taric emits a brilliant ball of prismatic light from his gemmed shield, stunning his target and damaging them based on how close he is to them.
spells.tooltip: Taric fires a prismatic sphere at a target enemy, stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Dazzle's damage increases the closer Taric is to the target.

spells.name: Radiance
spells.description: Taric slams his hammer into the ground to deal damage to nearby enemies. For a time after, Taric's gems radiate energy, empowering Taric and his allies with bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power.
spells.tooltip:
Taric slams his hammer into the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

For the next {{ e2 }} seconds, Taric's gems radiate energy, granting him {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and Ability Power and his nearby allies half of the bonuses.

spells.name: Bandage Toss
spells.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spells.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Despair
spells.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum health each second.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

spells.name: Tantrum
spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
spells.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
spells.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Parrrley
spells.description: Gangplank takes aim and shoots an enemy unit with his pistol. If Parrrley deals a killing blow, he gains extra gold and half the mana cost is refunded.
spells.tooltip:
Gangplank shoots a target unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If Parrrley deals a killing blow, Gangplank gains {{ e2 }} extra gold and half the mana cost is refunded.

Parrrley can crit and applies on hit effects as if a melee basic attack.

Total Gold Plundered: {{ f2 }} gold.

spells.name: Remove Scurvy
spells.description: Consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit which clears any crowd control effects on him and heals him.
spells.tooltip: Consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit which clears any crowd control effects on him and heals him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health.

spells.name: Raise Morale
spells.description: Gangplank fires a shot into the air, increasing nearby allied champions' attack damage and movement speed.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gangplank gains {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

Active: Gangplank fires his pistol into the air, disabling his passive boost but increasing his Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% and nearby allied champions' Attack Damage and Movement Speed by half that amount for 7 seconds.

spells.name: Cannon Barrage
spells.description: Gangplank signals his ship to fire upon an area for 6 seconds, slowing enemies and dealing damage in random locations within the area.
spells.tooltip: Signals Gangplank's ship to fire upon an area for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e2 }}% for the duration. Cannonballs rain upon the area, each causing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Chomp
spells.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e2 }} for 8 seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

spells.name: Frozen Domain
spells.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
spells.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

spells.name: Pillar of Ice
spells.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
spells.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Subjugate
spells.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic resistance stolen is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as magic damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

spells.name: Null Sphere
spells.description: Kassadin fires an ethereal bolt of void energy, dealing damage and silencing the target for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin fires a void bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Nether Blade
spells.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks restore Mana. The Mana restored is tripled against enemy champions. Active: Kassadin's basic attacks deal additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, restoring {{ e1 }} Mana each hit. If the target is an enemy champion, the Mana restored is tripled to {{ e3 }}.

Active: Kassadin charges his nether blade for {{ e4 }} seconds causing his basic attacks to deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Force Pulse
spells.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him. Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds in a cone in front of him.

spells.name: Riftwalk
spells.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana. Multiple champion hits with Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to deal additional damage.
spells.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units. Additionally, each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds costs {{ e5 }} additional Mana and deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage, stacks up to 10 times.

If Kassadin hits an enemy champion with Riftwalk, it refunds {{ e4 }}% of the cost.

spells.name: Plasma Fission
spells.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

spells.name: Void Rift
spells.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
spells.tooltip: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage. Both hits add a stack of Organic Deconstruction.

spells.name: Tectonic Disruption
spells.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

spells.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
spells.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals damage and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}), and slows enemies hit by {{ e3 }}% for 1 second. Adds a stack of Organic Deconstruction every 0.5 seconds.

Can be cancelled by recasting.

spells.name: Deadly Bloom
spells.description: Zyra grows a bud at target location. After a brief delay, it explodes, launching damaging thorns at all nearby enemies. If cast upon a seed, Deadly Bloom grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spells.tooltip:
Thorns shoot from the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within the area.

Rampant Growth: If Deadly Bloom hits a seed, a Thorn Spitter grows, dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

spells.name: Rampant Growth
spells.description: Zyra plants a seed, granting vision of an area for up to 30 seconds. Other spells cast on seeds will turn them into plants, who fight for Zyra. Additionally passively grants her Cooldown Reduction.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: Plants a seed, lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it will be destroyed but they will be revealed for 2 seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ f1 }} seconds (Max: 2 seeds stored, 4 seeds planted).

Rampant Growth: Cast spells on seeds to grow plants. Plant damage is based on Zyra's level. Extra plants striking the same target deal 50% less damage.

spells.name: Grasping Roots
spells.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast upon a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy movement speed.
spells.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second.

Rampant Growth: If Grasping Roots hits a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds. Lasts 10 seconds.

spells.name: Stranglethorns
spells.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
spells.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air.

Rampant Growth: Plants within the thicket are enraged, increasing their Attack Speed by 50%.

spells.name: Aqua Prison
spells.description: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.tooltip: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ebb and Flow
spells.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
spells.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for {{ e5 }} seconds or {{ e4 }} basic attacks. The ally's basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second.

spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position.

The Tidal Wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Dragon Strike
spells.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path.

spells.name: Golden Aegis
spells.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
spells.tooltip: Temporarily gains a shield that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for 5 seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Demacian Standard
spells.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed and Armor. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }} Armor.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

spells.name: Cataclysm
spells.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them.
spells.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

spells.name: Mystic Shot
spells.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1 second if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by 1 second if Mystic Shot hits a target.

spells.name: Essence Flux
spells.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Allied champions hit by the wave have their Attack Speed increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Arcane Shift
spells.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Trueshot Barrage
spells.description: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
spells.tooltip: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).
